column1: @entity1 was flying a toy plane in his yard.  He was having a great time!  @entity1 had a dog and a cat that were also playing in the yard.  He was also singing "Twinkle, @entity2."  @entity1 flew his toy plane too high.  It landed on the roof of his house.  @entity1 asked his dad to get it.  @entity1's dad said he had to borrow a ladder from next door.  @entity1's dad took a walk next door.  On the way, @entity1's dad waited for a duck to cross the road.  Finally, @entity1's dad went next door and asked his neighbor, @entity0, for a ladder.  @entity0 gave the ladder to @entity1's dad.  @entity0 also gave @entity1's dad a toy car, a toy train, a toy boat, and a coloring book that @entity1 could play with in case he could not get the plane.  @entity1's dad walked back to the house.  @entity1's dad climbed the ladder and took the plane from the roof.  @entity1 laughed and flew the plane again.  Afterward, they wanted to go to the beach.  @entity1 wanted to bring his bicycle.  @entity1's dad wanted to bring a towel and beach ball.  They made a big sand castle.  They saw a seagull walking on the sand.  It was getting late, so they went home and turned on the TV for a little bit.  They then went to bed, looking forward to another day of fun tomorrow!
@placeholder toy was @entity1 playing with that got stuck on the roof
